action.action-desc: Mrs. Hartzler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to allow grazing as a mid-contract management practice in the conservation reserve program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the CRP Grazing Flexibility Act.

subsection.text: Section 1233(b) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3833(b)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in paragraph (5), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
grazing pursuant to section 1232(a)(5) without any reduction in the rental rate, if the grazing is consistent with the conservation of soil, water quality, and wildlife habitat.

subsection.text: Section 1234(b) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3834(b)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The Secretary may not make any cost sharing payment to an owner or operator under this subchapter for any grazing undertaken pursuant to section 1232(a)(5).
